dc:description.dcterms:abstract: It is set that ET calves Holstein’s breeds after the indexes of mean time of period of embryonic development and living mass at birth for certain renounce to the analogues got as a result of artificial insemination of milk cattle. Thus the coefficient of changeability of living mass of new-born calves is higher and makes Cv=16,5 %.

ags:resource.dc:title: Therapeutic and prophylactic measures at mallofagosis pigeons
ags:resource.dc:subject: Ivermectin
Rock pigeon
Chewing lice
insecticide
Mallophagosis

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: The article provides information about the medicinal and profilactic effectiveness of use of Deltamethrin- and Ivermectin- based products on Mallophaga infections of pigeons. Evaluation of both spread and degree of effectiveness of each of the examined products was made

ags:resource.dc:subject: tehnology indicesbody strycture
soybean meal
diet
soybeans

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: Researches are conducted on the use in feeding of pigs of soy-bean forage. Determined that the data feed positively influence the formation of greasy meat-type pigs (index blockiness - 87,9-92,3%), promote energy growth, more economic use of feed, improving the meat quality, thick bacon

ags:resource.dc:title: Соlour and suckling productivity of cows of ukrainian redder pock-marked suckling breed
ags:resource.dc:subject: pigmentation
cattle
morphological and functional properties of the udd
Color

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: Investigated the relationship between hair color cows and their milk productivity and reproductive capacity. It was well-proven that they have the expressly expressed curvilinear character. A cross-correlation rejection in 2–3 times prevails the coefficient of correlation and at most cases is reliable. A cow is a competi- tive medium body hair pigmentation classes II and III.

ags:resource.dc:title: The evaluation of cows on the complex body indexes
ags:resource.dc:subject: milk productivity
exterior-constitutional type
body indexes
the cows with first lactation
correlation
traits

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: The improvement of cows evaluation on the complex body indexes and the search for optimal exterior con- stitutional parameters of highly productive cows in different breeding conditions are remaining relevant. Using of the complex of udder mass metric and body udder volume indexes provides selection of animals of a desired exterior con- stitutional type, increasing of the capacity of udder and milk productivity increase on 4,7-15,5%.

ags:resource.dc:title: The correlation between within-litter birth weights and reproductive performance in pigs of Pietrain breed «ADN» French selection
ags:resource.dc:subject: types of classification
within-litter birth weight
selection
Pietrain

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: By the conducted complex researches depending on the proper within-litter birth weight of pigs Pietrain breed ADN French selection it was proved the effectiveness of improvement reproductive perfor- mance of replacement gilts in the process of their raising and future sows reproductive performance on the base of replacement gilts selection by the within-litter birth weight feature.

ags:resource.dc:title: Definition seroprevalence of wild boars population in Ukraine to circovirus type two
ags:resource.dc:subject: antibody
wild boars
circovirus type two
seroprevalence
immunoperoxidase test

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: In article presented the results of serological monitoring of wild boar population in Ukraine is relatively circovirus infection. According to the research immunoperoxidase test in blood serum identified indicators seroprevalenсe wild boars populations bagged during 2001-2013 years to circovirus type two. Cartographically presents the number of investigated blood sera of wild boars in terms of areas of regions in Ukraine and years, and calculated percentages number of positive sera investigated

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: TARASENKO, L.; SELINA, V.; LYZOGUB, L.

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: t.Research has established the background levels of cadmium, cop- per, of lead, mercury and zinc in feed for laying hens. Experimentally proven properties of these elements accumulate in organs and tissues, egg productive poultry

heel horn cow
maintenance solutions
active exercise

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: Present structure and mechanism of the installation shown patents for utility model for active exercise and ensure natural erasure hoofed horn of the sole of trimming cattle under conditions of long-term maintenance of its stall

ags:resource.dc:title: Changing of rates of differential white blood cell count in rabbits by intramuscular injection of inactivat- ed polyvalent vaccine against leptospirosis in cattle

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: UKHOVSKIY, V.; ROZUMNYUK, A.; NEDOSEKOV, V.

ags:resource.dc:subject: leptospira
rabbits
leukocytes
cattle
leptospirosis
vaccine

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: Рresents the results of the study of the leucocycopoesis of the peripheral blood in rabbits (total quan- tity of leukocytes and the percentage of their separate forms (lymphocytes, monocytes, neutrophils, eosinophils, basophils), which were immunized with inactivated polyvalent vaccine against leptospirosis in cattle «variant bovis». The research results indicate that neutrophilic leukocytosis is developing on the 7th day after the immu- nization with this vaccine in the peripheral blood in rabbits, but on the 28th – there is eosinophilia, which is a natural reaction in animals to the injection of the inactivated pathogen of leptospirosis

ags:resource.dc:title: Detection of antibodies to L. interrogans serovar hardjo in cattle in Ukraine
ags:resource.dc:subject: serovar hardjo.
monitoring
microscopic agglutination test
Leptospirosis
antibodies
abortion
Leptospira

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: The article are presented the results of research of cattle blood sera samples for the presence of specific antibodies against 8 serological groups of leptospires, that are recommended for diagnostic at state laboratories of Ukraine and for presence an exotic for Ukrainian territory serovar L. hardjo using the microscopic agglutination test. It is identified the circulation L. Interrogans hardjo (serogroup Sejroe) at titers 1:50 and 1:100 among cattle in Ukraine.

ags:resource.dc:title: Distribution and development of express indication test kit

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: USHKALOV, V.; DERYABIN, O., MACHUS’KYY, A.; KOVTUN, V.

ags:resource.dc:subject: sensitivity
food
specificity
dependence
polymerase chain reaction
kit
Listeria

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: The authors have analyzed the distribution of Listeria spp. in the chain “from farm to fork”. It was found that there is no relationship between the incidence of listeriosis in animals and humans (coefficient of determination 0.04). At the same time the share of the impact of contaminated food on the incidence of listeriosis in humans is 45 % (coefficient of determination of 0.45). The authors have developed a kit for identification of the bacteria of the genus Listeria DNA by polymerase chain reaction, which is both sensi- tive and specific.

ags:resource.dc:title: The results of production tests of the polyvalent inactivated vaccine against leptospirosis in horses
ags:resource.dc:subject: horses
prevention
antibody titers
vac- cine
leptospirosis

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: According to the results of industri- al tests immunogenic effectiveness of experimen- tal sample of polyvalent inactivated vaccine against leptospirosis in horses was studied which is com- posed of antigens included four strains of lep- tospira serogroups: Grippotyphosa, Canicola, I cterohaemorrhagiae, Australis. It is established the expressed antige nic activity of an experimen- tal vacci ne preparation that ensures the forma- tion of a high level of antibodies in the blood of animals with the highest titer on day 14-21

hygiene
conditions of detention
performance
score
enterprise
biofermentatsiya

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: Established that the mode of mesophilic anaerobic conditions and lengthy process biofermentatsiyi diluted manure laying hens do not provide reception processed products, safe in the sanitary and hygienic attitude, providing them preliminary treatment by aerobic-thermophilic stabilization of biomass

ags:resource.dc:title: Aerobic-thermophilic stabilization of biomass for processing manure runoff
ags:resource.dc:subject: sewage
manure
biomass
pork
milk hygiene performance

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: established that liquid manure businesses for technology intensive milk production and pig manure removal by hydraulic systems with humidity 92–96% of it is advisable to expose aerobic biofermentatsiyi in autothermal mode, which allows you to get the products in a safe sanitary and hygienic attitude and reduce the loss of nutrients that determine the quality of organic fertilizers

ags:resource.dc:title: Dynamics of content of lipids and protein in blood of calves in the postnatal period for the injection of cholecalciferol to cows
ags:resource.dc:subject: cholecalciferol
phospholipids
lipids
protein
blood
cholesterol
triacylglycerols
cows
calves

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: The data about the changes of the blood content of lipids and proteins in the in dairy calves dur- ing the growing that were born frоm cows after intramuscular injection of different doses of cholecalciferol before and after calving. It is found that the blood of calves research groups, along with increased levels of the active metabolite of vitamin D3 - 25 OND3, marked changes in the content of total lipids, phospholipids, tryacylglycerols, cholesterol and total protein in the period from birth to 2 months old age

ags:resource.dc:title: Management information system selection and breeding work in the poultry
ags:resource.dc:subject: monitoring
poultry
performance
selection

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: The system of monitoring and information support breeding of poultry involving tribal enterprise data at various levels. The analytical information allows you to identify the most valuable genetic resources for poultry production and to develop proposals for their effective use and improvement.

ags:resource.dc:title: The reproductive qualities of sows of different groups of distribution stress
ags:resource.dc:subject: reproductive qualities
pigs
stress
SIRQS
groups of distribution

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: The materials evaluation reproductive qualities of sows of different groups on stress distribution under the criterion of SST. Based on absolute indicator selection index reproductive qualities of sows (SIRQS) are calculated. The levels of variation of the main signs of reproductive qualities of sows of different groups under stress distribution are found

ags:resource.dc:title: Multi-information-analytical system - technological component of livestock production

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Zhukorskyy, O.; Borisenko, V.; Ionov, I.; Shapovalov, C.

ags:resource.dc:subject: Information resources livestock
database

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: Improved governance in the field of animal-based development and use of new information technologies is possible with the use of workstation zootechnician through client-server technology. It allows: to justify the technological characteristics of livestock production at the enterprise level, in collaboration with regulatory resource parameters that are formed at the macro level, a number of problems to solve operations management in feeding and breeding, perform calculations on real data
